title: Dept's Artist Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:last-frontier darkmode=a]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Under the deep Well of Reality...
A small, small frog is making its masterpiece.

The frog's works flow outside the well,
And fell straight down a white wall cell.
----
Hi guys, welcome to my well at the bottom of reality. Down here are my SCP fanarts. There is not a lot at the moment but I will fill this page soon. Please feel free to suggest any SCP or character for me to draw next (I'm not good at drawing but I will do my best). Enjoy!
----
+ SCP fanart

[[collapsible show="SCP-049- Plague Doctor" hide=" hide"]]

[[image https://i.imgur.com/R2Eo68A.jpg width="600px"]]

[[/collapsible]]

-----

[[/collapsible]]

-----

[[collapsible show="MTF Epsilon-9 - Fire Eaters" hide="áº©n"]]

[[/collapsible]]

-----

I will stay here in the well for a while and make some more. Thanks for spending your time in the well. Goodbye.
author: Dept
